name: I'm Here (GGenp)
description:
Project 7 for Experimental Game Design, Spring 2023.

Created by: G Li.

How to Play:

  • Use your ears instead of your eyes.
  • Press WASD to move.
  • Press space to interact. A message will show up when the interaction is available.
  • Memorize that voice, then listen carefully. Closer voices are louder.
